name: KARTHIK BIBIREDDY
headline: Sr. Software Engineer | Distributed Systems & Data Infrastructure | Technical Leader
professionalSummary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of building and scaling distributed systems, high-throughput APIs, and data-intensive applications across Amazon and multiple startups. Recognized for driving cross-team technical initiatives, influencing system architectures, and mentoring engineers to deliver resilient and scalable solutions. Passionate about solving complex systems challenges, leading org-wide improvements, and aligning engineering execution with long-term business strategy.

workExperience.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
description: Drove adoption of generative AI by designing an event-driven investigation assistant built on a multi-agent architecture and reverse-indexed knowledge bases through MCP servers, enabling parallel ticket triage and cutting mean resolution time across on-call workflows.

Led global data infrastructure diversification, migrating reference pricing data and systems from DUB → ZAZ/FRA regions with zero downtime, contributing to 40% org-wide infrastructure cost reduction goals.

Evolved distributed pricing pipeline (Spark/EMR/Scala) supporting 30M+ global products, continuously adapting core computation logic to align with changing business needs, regional regulations, and compliance requirements, ensuring sustained accuracy and resilience.

Engineered high-performance messaging stack for automotive infotainment systems using C++ middleware and React Native UI, integrating Bluetooth and Alexa Cloud for real-time voice and SMS delivery on Amazon’s automotive OS.

Led development of Alexa’s Teachable AI feature, a Java-based service library connecting automotive Alexa skills to teachable ML models, enabling custom, user-defined voice mappings — launched in Rivian, Lamborghini, and additional OEMs in 2022.
Built low-latency Automotive Prompting Service in Java/RPC, enriching dialog responses with contextual data and adaptive suggestions, which reduced abandonment by 15% in Alexa Car Control.
Mentored and guided an intern to deliver a self-service debugging platform for pricing pipelines, adopted organization-wide and reducing on-call and support workload by one-third.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Architected and deployed scalable computer vision services enabling real-time face tracking and AR-based virtual try-on across web and mobile platforms.

Led team-wide WebAssembly performance optimization initiatives, analyzing algorithm and codebase to improve computational efficiency through precision tuning and memory optimizations, resulting in significant latency reductions and smoother real-time performance.
Worked across TypeScript frontend and C++ inference layers to ensure seamless integration, efficient data flow, and stable real-time rendering performance in browser environments.
Maintained and scaled company-wide cloud infrastructure, implementing containerized deployments, monitoring, and CI/CD pipelines to ensure high availability and consistent release cycles.
Collaborated directly with enterprise customers to design and deliver production-grade integrations, enabling reliable inference workloads and increasing platform adoption.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed aerospace ground control software with 3D geolocation mapping and real-time aircraft tracking via ASDB, ensuring low-latency telemetry visualization.
Built Primary Flight Display (PFD) using JavaScript/Node.js, broadcasting drone telemetry over UDP for real-time monitoring and decision-making.
Implemented key Airliner systems including Landing Gear software, Video Controller, and Vehicle State Manager, enhancing reliability and maintainability of the ground station platform.
Ensured all drone C++ code on NASA's Core Flight Systems framework met NASA standards for fault tolerance, redundancy, and real-time reliability.
Implemented rigorous QA practices through peer reviews, automated testing, and field validation during outdoor flight trials.

workExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Developed NLP-powered news aggregation widget using topic modeling and keyword extraction, deployed on McDermott’s corporate homepage.
Engineered enterprise-facing applications leveraging open-source NLP libraries for finance and energy customers.
Maintained and supported large-scale ingestion pipelines processing millions of global data sources for Zdaly’s enterprise data platform.

projects.title: Technical Analysis Platform for Financial Markets
description: Building a personal platform to backtest and analyze trading strategies using historical financial data, with event-driven AWS Lambda workflows, ETL pipelines for sentiment and technical analysis, and a React-based dashboard for strategy evaluation and performance tracking.

projects.title: Real Estate Investment Analysis Tool
description: Developed a web-based tool to evaluate real estate investment opportunities by comparing buying vs renting, incorporating inputs like purchase price, interest rate, taxes, and ownership costs to output projected ROI, breakeven points, and overall investment value in a clean, user-friendly interface.
